programmes.show_description: The Man Behind The Curtain. Since age three, a protective spirit has watched over Noah in his bedroom. But since moving in with his girlfriend, the spirit has turned sinister. S5, Ep7
Heartbreak House. An oppressive force has tormented Sonia and Baz since they extended their house. On the verge of splitting up, they desperately need help. S5, Ep8
Bad Luck Bungalow. Jacqueline and Dan are living in fear after years of frightening paranormal activity. The team spend the night at the bungalow to uncover the truth. S5, Ep9
Teleshopping.
Drew is in Cheshire to scour a barn packed with items, from traditional antique furniture to taxidermy. And in Sheffield, he uncovers a collection of early 20th century glass eyes. S14, Ep13
In Dorset, Drew visits a showroom full of mid-20th century items, including a pair of 1960s Danish leather chairs. And, he visits an Austin Healey and Porsche classic car restorer. S14, Ep14
A couple hoping to the Spanish coast decide that the ever-tranquil island of Mallorca is the place for them. They have up to £350,000 to spend on a home with the perfect view. S6, Ep4
Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals to ensure your next cruise is your greatest one!
Prospective buyers around the UK wanting to swap hectic city living for a home in the country are shown an array of beautiful rural properties. S18, Ep62
Drew and Tee head to Cornwall to visit a brewery in St Austell. Plus, they stop in Penzance and go for a surf in the sea during their South West adventure. S14, Ep16
In the Cotswolds, Drew looks around an impressive manor house. Then, he visits a converted chapel in Burnley filled with incredible antiques and a car show room in Jersey. S14, Ep17
Drew visits a shop in Lincolnshire that is filled with a plethora of valuable treasures. Plus, he stops by at an impressive house in Yorkshire, but is anything for sale? S14, Ep18
Natasha Raskin and Paul Laidlaw drive their vintage car through Norfolk and Suffolk. They unearth Ottoman militaria and more on their hunt for antique treasures. S14, Ep14
Natasha Raskin and Paul Laidlaw are on the final leg of their road trip. They're last auction is in Diss, but which of the pair will make the biggest profit? S14, Ep15
Woodwork expert Will and upholsterer Sonnaz work together to restore a very fragile chair. Meanwhile, Suzie attempts to revive a precious fireman's hat. S6, Ep6
Frazer Hines & Jenny Powell. Angus visits an ex-Emmerdale actor and a TV presenting legend. They then come to his auction house to see items from a Tardis to a boyband bed! S3, Ep3

programmes.show_name: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programmes.show_description: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell revisit families they helped reunite to find out what has happened since and how their lives have been transformed. S8, Ep2

programmes.show_name: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next
programmes.show_description: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell revisit families they helped reunite to find out what has happened since and how their lives have been transformed. S5, Ep2
Jay Blades saves two retro tulip chairs, a bureau, and some old fabric from a skip in Walsall. Can these discarded items be transformed into profit? S9, Ep20
Holland. Drew heads to Holland where, thanks to its thriving antiques markets, he can find the kind of unique pieces he's renowned for - including his dream car, a vintage Bugatti. S12, Ep8
Antiques experts Louise Gostelow and David Harper embark on the last leg of their road trip. Who will be triumphant at the final auction in Scarborough? S20, Ep20
Fix This Funky Floor Plan. Dave and Jenny Marrs face a major challenge with a confusing floor plan, forcing them to rethink every space. S7, Ep8
Alabama Awaits. After nine years of medical school, a newly qualified doctor and his wife search for their Alabama dream home. S18, Ep11
Best Friends And Helping Hands. After a $3 million lottery win, David helps a mother search for a starter home for her eldest daughter in Rochester, New York. S18, Ep12
Nightmare Nursery. Nursery owner Nina thinks her building is haunted. The team must figure out what lurks inside and help bring calm back to Nina's nursery. S5, Ep10
The Dangers Of Dabbling. New mother Chezelle is living in fear for her and her child's life. Can the team track down this malevolent spirit and restore peace to her home? S5, Ep11
Freaky Farmhouse. Robyn and Richard are tormented by strange sensations in their farmhouse. Psychic artist Andy Moore works out what's happening in their haunted home. S5, Ep12

An ex-music executive and aspiring writer is on the lookout for a holiday home in the Italian island of Sicily. She has £400,000 to spend on a novelist's perfect bolt hole. S6, Ep5

Drew is at a country house sale in Norfolk, and in Glasgow he finds a unique tartan piece at a classic tailor's. Plus, he finds his oddest buy ever in Liverpool. S10, Ep2
Drew revs up at the Lambretta Scooter Museum in Weston Super Mare - will a vintage bike tempt him? In Walsall, there's a historic haul in one of the UK's last leather factories. S10, Ep3
Clocked & Loaded Auction. Angus helps a roofer-turned-artist sell his sculptures for a small fortune. Plus, a woman is auctioning off her inherited clock collection. S6, Ep4
Heavy Metal Sputnik. Angus helps two grieving families. Satellite-themed cup-holders and a huge gold ring do well, but a haul of hard rock albums gets everyone spinning. S6, Ep5
Tongs Will Wag! Quirky items, including a secret society's ballot box, an uncle's gold tooth, and expensive kitchenware, create a buzz in the auction room. S6, Ep6
Izzie Balmer sets off with a new rival in the classic car, Ishy Khan. These jewellery experts compete to find profitable antiques in the Lakes. S26, Ep16
Auctioneer Izzie and jewellery expert Ishy head for the Pennines. There's an alligator, and a tale of an eccentric gardener before a Barnsley auction. S26, Ep17
Auctioneer Izzie and jewellery expert Ishy explore all things Yorkshire in their vintage motor. Will an old and rare padlock be key to an auction win? S26, Ep18
Experts Izzie and Ishy do Derbyshire. A 1930s necklace and a miniature croquet set head to auction, but only after a night-time rowboat escapade. S26, Ep19
Ishy and Izzie head to a final Leicestershire auction with broken pineapples, legless glass ladies, mystery board games and an antique pub table. S26, Ep20
Robot maker Mark Haig transforms a tumble dryer drum. Designer Daniel Heath revamps a record cabinet, while Sarah Moore repurposes some nuts and bolts. S7, Ep5
Upholsterer Leigh-Anne Treadwell revamps a tired sofa. Bag maker Neil Wragg works on some retro deckchairs, and Sarah Moore transforms two tables. S7, Ep6
Jay Blades rescues a record player, a pub table and a farmhouse chair. He enlists Sarah Peterson and Paul Parry to help transform these unwanted items. S7, Ep7
